channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: Mark Knoller​ may be the only person in Washington, D.C., who was revered by both Republican and Democratic presidents.

item.title: Moore: ‘I have no interest in fighting with the president'
item.description: “Asking me to deploy my National Guard" is "not a serious approach,” Maryland Gov. Wes Moore told ABC News' “This Week” co-anchor Martha Raddatz.

item.title: Illinois Gov. Pritzker says sending troops to Chicago would be an "invasion"
item.description: Illinois Gov. JB Pritzker told CBS News that President Trump has "other aims" aside from fighting crime, as he vows to crack down in Chicago.
